column4: when i use world of warcraft on opengl mode it give me an error,but i can run it in direct x(but it goes very slow) i'm using lucid 32bits with intel g31 without compiz.  PD:render yes.gears:5000 frames in 5s
dr_willis in #winehq no activity and in app database isn't the solution
it's a terrible benchmark (and isn't suppose to be used as one) but I get 22070 frames in 5.0 seconds with glxgears
